title: My Thunderbird has stopped working
content: My Thunderbird has stopped working, don't know what to do. It has been updated...
creator: schulte108

title: Secondary gmail account
content: I just set up a Gmail account and transferred all my files from Outlook to my new Thunderbird Gmail. I haven't told anyone about it yet and don't like the name I used. I would like to change the name or set up another account that forwards all emails to the one I just set up before I notify every one of the changes. Thanks for your help and keep it simple; I'm not tech Savey. i.e. -abc@gmail .com to xyz@gmail.com
creator: adleyrose01

title: Cannot receive email on Thunderbird
content: Thunderbird unexpectedly quit working on my desktop computer. The problem may have coincided with an outage (broken fiber cable) with my ISP. I worked with the ISP tech to no avail.
creator: rob.loftin

title: Sending emails from Thunderbird are now timing out.  I have been many years with Thunderbird and it has never happened before???
content:
As my subject says I have been with Thunderbird for many years and have never not being able to send emails. I'm now unble to send emails. The message i get when trying to send an email is

Sending of the message failed. The message could not be sent because the connection to Outgoing server (SMPT) timed out. Try again.

My out going server is seebo- smpt.optusnet.com.au (Default)

This has not changed for many many years Can you help please.
creator: seebo1

title: Thunderbird does not receive or send messages
content:
I use Thunderbird to download and send messages - my hosting is with Primus in Canada. I am vacationing in Pakistan and no messages are downloading. When I try to reply to a message it says 'Sending message' but after about 30 seconds, this appears

Sending of the message failed. The message could not be sent because connecting to Outgoing server (SMTP) mail.magma.ca failed. The server may be unavailable or is refusing SMTP connections. Please verify that your Outgoing server (SMTP) settings are correct and try again.
creator: fkarmally
